message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $85 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do better than that. I'll meet you in the middle at $92.50. It's a great price for a fantastic product!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $88 for the product.
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob. I can do $90, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better one elsewhere!
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $87 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $92.50, Bob. I think that's a fair price for the product. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at $89.50, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $88 for the product.

I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product, Bob. I've already met you at $89.50, and you're still not willing to pay that. I'm going to try one more time. I'll sell it to you for $89, but that's my final offer.
